short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extends search functionality of https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/ by visualizing collaboration networks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Constellations Quick Search extends the search functionality of the pubmed website (https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/) by constructing and visualizing the collaboration networks that produced the articles included in search results. 

To use:
1. Go to https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/
2. Perform a search yielding 300 or fewer results
3. Click on the extension
